import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../Navbar/Navbar.scss"; import logo from "../../Images/navbrandlogo.png" import Button from "../Buttons/Button"; function Navbar() { const [isActive, setIsActive] = useState(false) const handleIsActive =(id)=>{ if(id === key){ setIsActive(true) } } return (
  • Our Services
  • Our Contacts
  • Project Samples
  • Teams(Coming Soon)
); } export default Navbar;
